item.title: 分子结构
item.description: 硝酸 硫酸 磺酸 亚磺酸 次磺酸 磷酸 亚磷酸 硼酸 B: sp2 杂化时，分子为平面三角形结构：1s2 2s2 2p1 2p0 2p0 -> 1s2 2s1 2p1 2p1 2p0 -> 1s2 2sp1 2sp1 2sp1 2p0 一个 2s 轨道上的电子被激发到 2p 轨

item.title: 化合物专利
item.description: 化合物专利 化学药品的本质是化合物，化合物是所有化学药品的源头。化学药可以利用马库什 (Markush) 专利的方式进行化合物专利保护（生物药可以用药品本身的靶点

item.title: 伊树制药
item.description: 定位 长期目标：运用全新无载体纳米递送技术，实现多疾病用药的纳米化。 中国目前没有任何纳米药物上市，领域内无竞争； 无载体纳米递送技术是基于临床在

item.title: 羊皮之下
item.description: 山不在高，有仙则名，水不在深，有龙则灵。 斯是陋室，唯吾德馨。 当你看到，其面对利益以一种欺压的方式对待真正的贡献者时，你就应该明白，其口中所标

item.title: 基于分子结构的无载体纳米递送体系
item.description: 研究背景 日本科学家片冈一则因开创基于载体的纳米药物递送系统而被视为竞争诺贝尔生理学或医学奖的有力人选。该递送系统利用两亲性高分子材料在水中能

item.title: Using R
item.description: Install Xcode command line tools for using commands like make, GCC, clang, perl, svn, git, size, strip, strings, libtool, cpp… xcode-select --install Install Homebrew - /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)" brew list --versions brew outdated brew update brew cleanup Install Homebrew Cask brew install caskroom/cask/brew-cask ursing brew cask to install and update R and Rstudio: brew cask install r brew link --overwrite r brew cask uninstall --force brew cask upgrade brew update && brew upgrade && brew cleanup During upgrading, If you get an error of the type Error:

item.title: Manuscript is being considered for acceptance
item.description: Thanks for the positive and valuable comments from the reviewers and the editor. Actually, several things about these comments are very intresting. For instance, I don’t know why there is only one sentence from Reviewr 1 alrough the comment is very positive. The second thing is the review time for this manuscript is so long that I suddently recieve this email after more than half a year. I’m wondering if it takes such long time to write down those letters.

item.title: Bay of science
item.description: A research paper is a special publication written by scientists to be read by ALL the human beings. Ways to Knowledge Sci-Hub https://sci-hub.se https://sci-hub.tw https://sci-hub.shop Library Genesis located in Holland http://gen.lib.rus.ec/ http://libgen.lc/ https://libgen.pw/ Books http://booksc.org http://b-ok.org https://b-ok.org/ http://en.bookfi.net/ http://m.bookfi.net/ Extentions for Browsers Auto Sci-Hub: https://roiarthurb.github.io/Side-Auto_Sci-Hub/ Pubmedplus: https://service.pubmedplus.com/pubmedplus-extension Tampermonkey: https://www.tampermonkey.net/ PMC https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/ Glgoo https://xue.glgoo.org/ 猫咪论文 https://lunwen.im/ 读秀 https://www.duxiu.com/ 学术导航网站 文献小

item.title: Polymeric micelles
item.description:
Polymeric micelles

Introduction

Polymeric micelles

  • The biological properties of materials used in forming micelles
  • The methods of preparation(take examples)
  • The micellization and micelle morphology. the relationship between (the characteristic of aggregation, properties of molecular aggregates with different sizes, and the parameters of the initial and final states of the micellar solution)
